SC Consumer
DescriptionA generic consumer that receives and processes transactions coming from its blocking-transport in export.

Description

A generic consumer that receives and processes transactions coming from its blocking-transport in export.  It performs no meaningful functionality--it prints the transaction, waits the specified delay, then sends it out its analysis port.

.../examples/commands/consumer.cpp


#include "systemc.h"
#include "tlm.h"
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;
using namespace sc_core;
using namespace tlm;

class consumer : public sc_module,
      public tlm_blocking_transport_if<tlm_generic_payload> {

  public:
  sc_export<tlm_blocking_transport_if<tlm_generic_payload> > in;
  sc_port<tlm_analysis_if<tlm_generic_payload>,
                          0,SC_ZERO_OR_MORE_BOUND> analysis_out;

  consumer(sc_module_name nm) : 
    in("in"),
    analysis_out("analysis_out")
  {
    in(*this);
  }

  virtual void b_transport (tlm_generic_payload& t,
                            sc_core::sc_time& delay) {
    cout << sc_time_stamp() << " SC consumer executing packet:"
       << endl << "  " << t << endl;
    wait(delay);
    delay = SC_ZERO_TIME;
    analysis_out->write(t);
  }
};
